title: Rainy city driving with moderate braking

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day to ensure safety. The braking events are likely due to the reduced visibility and slippery road conditions. The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles and adjusting its speed according to the traffic flow.
